executeCountQuery

protected Number executeCountQuery(Table table,
                                   List<FilterItem> whereItems,
                                   boolean functionApproximationAllowed)
Description copied from class: QueryPostprocessDataContext
Executes a simple count query, if possible. This method is provided to allow subclasses to optimize count queries since they are quite common and often a datastore can retrieve the count using some specialized means which is much more performant than counting all records manually.

Overrides:
executeCountQuery in class QueryPostprocessDataContext
Parameters:
table - the table on which the count is requested.
whereItems - a (sometimes empty) list of WHERE items.
functionApproximationAllowed - whether approximation is allowed or not.
Returns:
the count of the particular table, or null if not available.

executePrimaryKeyLookupQuery

protected Row executePrimaryKeyLookupQuery(Table table,
                                           List<SelectItem> selectItems,
                                           Column primaryKeyColumn,
                                           Object keyValue)
Description copied from class: QueryPostprocessDataContext
Executes a query which obtains a row by primary key (as defined by Column.isPrimaryKey()). This method is provided to allow subclasses to optimize lookup queries since they are quite common and often a datastore can retrieve the row using some specialized means which is much more performant than scanning all records manually.

Overrides:
executePrimaryKeyLookupQuery in class QueryPostprocessDataContext
Parameters:
table - the table on which the lookup is requested.
selectItems - the items to select from the lookup query.
primaryKeyColumn - the column that is the primary key
keyValue - the primary key value that is specified in the lookup query.
Returns:
the row if the particular table, or null if not available.

materializeMainSchemaTable

protected DataSet materializeMainSchemaTable(Table table,
                                             Column[] columns,
                                             int maxRows)
Description copied from class: QueryPostprocessDataContext
Executes a simple one-table query against a table in the main schema of the subclasses of this class.

Specified by:
materializeMainSchemaTable in class QueryPostprocessDataContext
Parameters:
table - the table to query
columns - the columns of the table to query
maxRows - the maximum amount of rows needed or -1 if all rows are wanted.
Returns:
a dataset with the raw table/column content.
